rows.label: qev011501_MSG0001
rows.name:
Flunked AGAIN?! Augh! Stupid Walter is the worst
instructor ever! Power-tripping idiot...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0002
rows.name:
Yeah? Can I help you? I'm kind of in a mood here,
so make it quick before I bite your head off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev011501_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Mia what has her so riled up.

rows.label: qev011501_JNK0020
rows.name: Provoke

rows.label: qev011501_SEL0021
rows.name: Say something to get a rise out of Mia.

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0003
rows.name:
Ugh. Thanks for asking. I'm going to explode if
I don't vent to somebody...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0004
rows.name:
Oh, ha ha ha. I'm glad to see all the comedians
weren't wiped out when Earth blew up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0005
rows.name:
Let's see how funny it is when I eat your face!
Hold still...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0006
rows.name:
...Blech! Never mind. When was the last time you
washed that thing, anyway?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0007
rows.name:
That face is too gross to eat. I'll just complain
to it instead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0008
rows.name:
I'm a mechanic at the moment, but I've applied
for a transfer to BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0009
rows.name:
Except this idiot instructor, Walter, keeps failing me
on the aptitude test![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0010
rows.name:
He says I can't handle ordnance correctly.
Says I'm not "mentally prepared" for BLADE.
And he's flunked me 45 times in a row![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0011
rows.name:
I've been studying every day. I even keep a set of
books in the BATHROOM, which is so very gross.
Can you believe this?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_JNK0030
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev011501_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Mia why she is so set on joining BLADE.

rows.label: qev011501_JNK0040
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev011501_SEL0041
rows.name: Suggest to Mia that she reconsider her career goals.

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0012
rows.name:
THANK YOU for asking! It's about time a good listener
showed up around here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0013
rows.name:
HARSH! You and Walter should hook up.
But you're not going to break my spirit![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0014
rows.name:
I refuse to hole up in a safe little corner while the fight
for human survival rages on outside![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0015
rows.name: ...Or that's what I tell people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0016
rows.name:
But outside NLA's walls is a whole world of experiences
you could never find on Earth![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0017
rows.name:
It's got me burning with wanderlust!
I want to set foot where no one has before!
To see sights previously unseen![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0018
rows.name:
But Walter's got me trapped in this cage!
I need OUT, man! I need to be FREE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_JNK0050
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: qev011501_SEL0051
rows.name:
Suggest to Mia that she could
always just sneak out sometime.

rows.label: qev011501_JNK0060
rows.name: Dissuade

rows.label: qev011501_SEL0061
rows.name:
Warn Mia that, if she isn't fit for duty,
she shouldn't venture outside of NLA.

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0019
rows.name:
Wait, that's... Holy mackerel, that's brilliant.
You're a GENIUS PERSON![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0020
rows.name:
Oh, look at that! It's another Walter!
They're cloning them now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0021
rows.name:
I don't need this hassle, man. I'll just duck out of NLA
on my own if that's what it takes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0022
rows.name:
It's decided, then. I leave today, and ain't nobody
gonna stop me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0023
rows.name:
Hmm... You know, it's probably a LITTLE nuts to just
run off without the proper equipment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0024
rows.name:
Think you could find me some protective wear and
some kind of weapon? I mean, you're pretty much
my accomplice at this point anyway, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0025
rows.name: I'm so glad I picked a reasonable person.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0026
rows.name:
Grab iron blades and some combat bodywear,
then meet me back here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0027
rows.name:
That should be enough to weather any unruly indigens
I come across, yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0028
rows.name:
Oh, and if you could hurry, that'd be great.
I've got a fever for adventure, so I want to
strike while the iron's hot![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0034
rows.name:
I need iron blades and some combat bodywear.
Got it? Good! Now go get it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011501_MSG0035
rows.name:
And put a rush on that, if you can. My fever for
adventure is about to hit CRITICAL MASS![ST:wait ]
